content: this is dmg and in this video we're gonna be talking about how to make some
really disgusting Coop's markers bring out your dead
all righty corpse markers now of course you're gonna kill a hell of a lot of
stuff in your games so you're gonna need these things for just today and about
afterwards so you're gonna grab some washes as you've seen me use as basis
for minis in mini magic and you can apply just some card stock or garbage
cardboard on to those and onto that we're going to just drop raw red paint
so raw is not a classification or brand it is just we haven't mixed it or
anything just comes straight out of the tube and just blob it on there we're at
a toothpick and the hot glue gun and when it's gonna blob a whole lot of hot
glue on top of the red paint and you'll see me continue to do that and while
it's still curing while it's still hot because there's a lot of hot glue you
mush it around that's a proper term for this I'm oh around and start to get
wisps and things and paint all over your fingers and just you know get things
stuck to things and make strands and push the strands down and essentially
you're just creating a big ol mess so into that messy thing and add some Brown
ink or we heavily walk down Brown paint and you're just gonna fill in the dark
and recessed areas of those markers with that and then just apply a little bit
more hot glue just to you know stick things down if there's bits sticking
around just stick them down or that hot glue and then once we've done that we're
going to grab our big-ass bag of beads that's the big-ass bag of beads the bad
bauble I'm gonna call it bad bug from now on because you know I think I need
another catchphrase as if you're like button weren't enough so after we grab
the bug the bad Bob got it wrong already the bad bulb you put the hot glue down
and gets multiple beads of multiple different colors and the colors should
be things like yellow orange pink red etc so that they will blend in nicely
and you won't have things that are contrasting like white or green or blue
or anything like that so once you've some hot glued down and stuck in the
bead you can do two on a thing if you want of course the beads are different
sizes as well and that's why bad bulb comes in handy because generally there's
a whole bunch of different sizes and colors in a bare bulb right so once you
stick down all those they will probably still be paint on the thing that has not
yet dried so you can smear over that paint over the balls the balls the beads
and then I'm using a mixture of black and brown ink which again are going into
the dark spaces and recesses and things and then continuing with the remaining
paint and just painting around the edges of the markers themselves so that's what
they're looking at now you know it's quite nolle but it's a bit dry so this
idea was stolen from black magic craft pillow POW as our friend hankerin keeps
talking about and you just apply that nail polish onto here now that nail
